scripts.cy:run:cpq: cypress run --browser chrome --config-file cypress.ci.json --config baseUrl=https://jsapps.cpce-teamtiger1-d2-public.model-t.cc.commerce.ondemand.com,defaultCommandTimeout=100000,requestTimeout=1000000,responseTimeout=1000000,pageLoadTimeout=1000000 --reporter junit --reporter-options mochaFile=results/test-results-[hash].xml --env API_URL=https://api.cpce-teamtiger1-d2-public.model-t.cc.commerce.ondemand.com --spec "cypress/integration/**/cpq-configuration.core-e2e-spec.ts"
scripts.cy:run:ci: cypress run --browser chrome --config-file cypress.ci.json --record --key $CYPRESS_KEY --tag "b2c,all" --parallel --ci-build-id $BUILD_NUMBER --group B2C --spec "cypress/integration/!(vendor|b2b|ssr|cx_ccv2)/**/*e2e-spec.ts" --reporter junit --reporter-options mochaFile=results/e2e-test-b2c-[hash].xml
scripts.cy:run:ci:b2b: cypress run --browser chrome --config-file cypress.ci.json --env BASE_SITE=powertools-spa,OCC_PREFIX_USER_ENDPOINT=orgUsers --record --key $CYPRESS_KEY --tag "b2b,all" --parallel --ci-build-id $BUILD_NUMBER --group B2B --spec "cypress/integration/b2b/regression/**/*e2e-spec.ts" --reporter junit --reporter-options mochaFile=results/e2e-test-b2b-[hash].xml
scripts.cy:run:ci:ccv2: cypress run --browser chrome --config-file cypress.ci.json --config baseUrl=$ENDPOINT_URL_PUBLIC_SPARTACUS --reporter junit --reporter-options mochaFile=results/spartacus-test-results-[hash].xml --env API_URL=$ENDPOINT_URL_PUBLIC_API --spec $E2ES_TO_RUN
scripts.cy:run:ci:ccv2-b2b: cypress run --browser chrome --config-file cypress.ci.json --config baseUrl=$ENDPOINT_URL_PUBLIC_SPARTACUS --reporter junit --reporter-options mochaFile=results/spartacus-test-results-[hash].xml --env API_URL=$ENDPOINT_URL_PUBLIC_API,BASE_SITE=powertools-spa,OCC_PREFIX_USER_ENDPOINT=orgUsers --spec "cypress/integration/cx_ccv2/regression/b2b/**/*.e2e-spec.ts"
scripts.cy:run:ci:ccv2-cpq: cypress run --browser chrome --config-file cypress.ci.json --config baseUrl=$ENDPOINT_URL_PUBLIC_SPARTACUS --reporter junit --reporter-options mochaFile=results/spartacus-test-results-[hash].xml --env API_URL=$ENDPOINT_URL_PUBLIC_API,BASE_SITE=powertools-spa,OCC_PREFIX_USER_ENDPOINT=orgUsers --spec "cypress/integration/**/cpq-configuration.ccv2-e2e-spec.ts"
scripts.cy:run:ci:ssr: cypress run --browser chrome --config-file cypress.ci.json --config baseUrl=http://localhost:4000 --record --key $CYPRESS_KEY --tag "ssr,all" --parallel --ci-build-id $BUILD_NUMBER --group SSR --spec "cypress/integration/ssr/pages.core-e2e-spec.ts" --reporter junit --reporter-options mochaFile=results/e2e-test-ssr-[hash].xml
